comment: Why do so many people (especially americans) on gab not understand that National Socialism is not communist socialism. They attack Hitler for being a "socialist savage" and in the same moment still claim that they were not brainwashed by Hollywood etc. when all they do is copy phrases used by exactly those.
amr:
# ::snt Why do so many people (especially americans) on gab not understand that National Socialism is not communist socialism. They attack Hitler for being a "socialist savage" and in the same moment still claim that they were not brainwashed by Hollywood etc. when all they do is copy phrases used by exactly those.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / understand-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (p2 / person
                              :mod (c / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "America"))
                              :mod (e / especially)))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                        :ARG2 (m2 / many)
                        :ARG3 (s / so)))
            :ARG1 (p3 / political-movement
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "socialism")
                  :domain (p4 / political-movement
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "National"
                              :op2 "Socialism")))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (a3 / attack-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Hitler"))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / savage
                        :mod (p6 / political-movement
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "socialism"))))
            :op2 (c3 / claim-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (b / brainwash-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 a2
                        :op1 (m3 / market-sector
                              :name (n6 / name
                                    :op1 "Hollywood"))
                        :op2 (e2 / et-cetera))
                  :ARG1 t)
            :mod (s3 / still)
            :time (m4 / moment
                  :ARG1-of (s4 / same-01))
            :time (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (c4 / copy-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG1 (p7 / phrase
                              :ARG1-of (u2 / use-01
                                    :ARG0 t
                                    :ARG2 (t2 / that)
                                    :mod (e3 / exact))))
                  :mod (a4 / all))))

comment: Your choice in words are very offensive and you should try to be little more mindful of what you say.
amr:
# ::snt Your choice in words are very offensive and you should try to be little more mindful of what you say.
(a / and
      :op1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (c / choose-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (w / word))
            :degree (v / very))
      :op2 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (t / try-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG2 (v2 / vigilant-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (s / say-01
                                          :ARG0 y)))
                        :ARG3 (m / more
                              :quant (l / little))))
            :ARG2 y))

comment: Use of this language is hurtful, please refrain from using it.

      :op1 (h / hurt-01

                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :mod (t / this))))
